ðŸ“– Summary: ScreenCoder is an intelligent UI-to-code generation system that transforms UI screenshots or design mockups into clean, production-ready HTML/CSS code. It uses a modular multi-agent architecture, combining visual understanding, layout planning, and adaptive code synthesis to produce accurate and editable front-end code, allowing for customized modifications.
